name: Kamen Rider: The Bike Race
summary: Kamen Rider will outrun the Shocker in this racing game aimed at the ultimate goal. Take on a circuit with a total of 13 authentic bikes from the Kamen Rider series. Grand Battle mode takes rival riders across the circuit. Or duke it out in Battle Royal mode!

alternative_names.name: Simple Characters 2000 Series Vol. 03: Kamen Rider: The Bike Race
